name: mind the gap (deadbrain.games)
description:
A 2D infinite runner side scrolling platform where you are running from something and need to avoid gaps in the ground, fire and haunted enemies to reach the as far as you can.

How far can you make?

This is an open-source game which can be found at https://code.deadbrain.games/mind-the-gap.git

The game was made using free assets (mostly from other itch.io users):

  • art: 8x8 PICO 8 by s4m_ur4i
  • font: Silverfinster Font by heaven castro
  • music: Race to Mars by DOS-88
  • sound fx: GAMEBOY SFX PACK #1 by OmegaPixelArt
